metadata.title: CVE-2023-37543 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti before 1.2.6 allows IDOR (Insecure Direct Object Reference) foraccessing any graph via a modified local_graph_id parameter tograph_xport.php. This is a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-16723.

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
